statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, longitude, latitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT AVG(latitude), MAX(longitude) FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE latitude > 40.0 ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, latitude, longitude FROM vehicles WHERE longitude < -100.0;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 50.0 ORDER BY route_name;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT vehicle_name, latitude, longitude FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_name LIKE '%car%' ORDER BY latitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM vehicles WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_name LIKE 'Car%' AND (latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40)
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_status FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT last_known_location, last_updated FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_status = 'Active';
SELECT vehicle_name, last_known_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_known_location, last_updated FROM vehicles WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT tracking_id, vehicle_id, route_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT vehicle_name, last_known_location FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT vehicle_name, last_known_location FROM routes INNER JOIN vehicles ON routes.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'car';
SELECT * FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, start_time FROM routes WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicle ORDER BY make DESC;
SELECT model, make FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM assignment WHERE assignment_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make DESC, model ASC
SELECT driver_id, name, phone_number, email FROM driver WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT assignment_id, a.route_id, a.vehicle_id, v.make, v.model, d.name FROM assignment a INNER JOIN vehicle v ON a.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id INNER JOIN driver d ON a.driver_id = d.driver_id
SELECT * FROM location WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -75.0

SELECT r.route_id, r.distance, l1.address as start_address, l2.address as end_address FROM route r INNER JOIN location l1 ON r.start_location_id = l1.location_id INNER JOIN location l2 ON r.end_location_id = l2.location_id ORDER BY r.distance DESC
